summary: AI Engineer with expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and LLM applications. Experienced in building scalable ML systems, training neural networks, and deploying AI solutions in production. Strong background in Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, and cloud ML platforms.

experience.title: AI Engineer
experience.description: Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI applications for production use
achievements: Built LLM-powered applications serving 50,000+ users with 99.9% uptime
Reduced model inference time by 60% through optimization and efficient deployment
Implemented MLOps pipeline that accelerated model deployment by 10x
Led development of computer vision system achieving 95% accuracy on production data

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: Developed ML models and data pipelines for recommendation systems and predictive analytics
achievements: Built recommendation engine that increased user engagement by 35%
Designed feature engineering pipeline processing 1TB+ daily data
Implemented A/B testing framework for ML model performance evaluation
Optimized model training pipeline reducing training time from hours to minutes

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.thesis: Advanced Neural Architecture Search for Computer Vision Tasks

projects.name: Multi-Modal LLM Application
projects.description: Built a production-ready application combining text and image processing using transformers
achievements: Integrated CLIP and GPT models for multi-modal understanding
Achieved 40ms average response time with caching optimization
Deployed using microservices architecture handling 1000+ concurrent users

projects.name: Real-time Object Detection System
projects.description: End-to-end computer vision pipeline for real-time object detection and tracking
achievements: Implemented custom YOLO model achieving 92% mAP on custom dataset
Built real-time streaming pipeline with sub-100ms latency
Created automated data annotation and model retraining system

projects.name: Distributed Training Framework
projects.description: Built framework for distributed training of large language models across multiple GPUs
achievements: Reduced training time for 7B parameter models by 75%
Implemented gradient compression reducing communication overhead by 60%
Created fault-tolerant training with automatic checkpoint recovery

publications.title: Efficient Neural Architecture Search for Edge Deployment
